Translations.Text: Jintian, mei ren dou jiang yin ziji suo zuo de [shan e] huode baochou; jintian,[mei geren dou] bu shou kuidai. An la que shi qingsuan shensu de.
Ni [mu sheng] dang jinggao tamen linjin zhi ri [fuhuo ri]. Na shi, xin jiang yin youchou er tiao dao yanhou. Bu yi zhe ji meiyou renhe qinyou, ye meiyou renhe qiuqing zhe yuan ting qi suku.
Ta [an la] zhidao yan suo bu chengshi de he xiongzhong suoyincang de.
An la yi zhenli panjue, tamen she ta [an la] er qiqiu de [ouxiang] ze buneng panjue renhe shi. An la que shi quan wen de, quan shi de.

Nandao tamen meiyou zai da dishang luxing, guancha tamen qian ren de jieju ruhe ma? Qian ren de shili bi tamen de geng qiangda, zai da dishang [liu xia] de yiji [bi tamen de] geng duo, dan an la zhong yin tamen de zui'e chengfale tamen. Renhe ren dou buneng baohu tamen mian shou an la de xingfa.
Zhe shi yinwei tamen de shizhemen yi daizhe mingzhengdaoda tamen, dan tamen reng bu xiangxin [shizhemen], suo yi, an la chengfale tamen. Ta que shi zui qiang da de, chengfa zui yanli de.
Wo que yi paiqian mu sa [zhu] daizhe wo de jixiang he mingzheng,
qu jiaohua falao, ha man he gao lun, dan tamen shuo:“[Ta] shi moshu shi, shi shuohuang zhe.”

Dang ta daizhe cong wo jiang shi de zhenli daoda tamen shi, tamen shuo:“Nimen dang sha si tong ta yiqi xinyang de renmen de nanhai, zhi rang tamen de nuhai [funu] huozhe.” Bu xinyang zhe de yinmou zhishi wu ru qitu.
